thread.title: [Webinar] Mobile Device Management for Health Care Organizations and Vendors - Sept. 10th, 10:00am PDT
thread.title_full: [Webinar] Mobile Device Management for Health Care Organizations and Vendors - Sept. 10th, 10:00am PDT

author: Davis Wright Tremaine LLP
title: [Webinar] Mobile Device Management for Health Care Organizations and Vendors - Sept. 10th, 10:00am PDT
text:
</iframe> 
Time: 10:00 a.m. PDT In this webinar, we will demystify the HIPAA Security Rule and how to apply the administrative, physical, and technical safeguards in a mobile environment. We will discuss key takeaways from the recently released NIST Draft Guide on Securing Health Records on Mobile Devices and offer practical considerations for conducting a HIPAA risk analysis. From large HIPAA breaches to recent HHS Office for Civil Rights (OCR) enforcement action, we will look at lessons learned that may weigh on a mobile device management strategy. Attorney Presenters: Anna Watterson and Adam Greene
